saveAllProfiles(Profile[]) - Static method in class BackEnd.Profile
This method causes all profile object instances to save into text files.
saveFile() - Method in class BackEnd.Leaderboard
Saves a leaderboard to a file, overwriting the current one.
saveGame() - Method in class BackEnd.GameLogic
Saves the game to file
savePlayersAndStart() - Method in class FrontEnd.PickPlayerController
Identifies the player chosen has the right number and style.
saveToFile() - Method in class BackEnd.GameSave
Saves user choices to file.
Score - Class in BackEnd
Stores the wins/loss for one profile
Score(String, int, int) - Constructor for class BackEnd.Score
Creates a new Score.
setBeenBackTracked() - Method in class BackEnd.Player
Set that this player cannot be backtracked again.
setFireCoords(Coordinate) - Method in class BackEnd.Gameboard
This method sets fire in a 3x3 radius to the given coordinates.
setFireTic(int) - Method in class BackEnd.FloorTile
This method sets the boolean onFire to true, which means the tile is now on fire also ticks down until two player cycles has happened.
setFixed() - Method in class BackEnd.FloorTile
This method sets the isFixed value of a given tile to either true, or false.
setFreezeCoords(Coordinate) - Method in class BackEnd.Gameboard
This method freezes in a 3x3 radius to the given coordinates.
setFrozenTic(int) - Method in class BackEnd.FloorTile
This method sets the boolean isFrozen to true, which means the tile is now frozen also ticks down until one player cycles has happened.
setInitData(HashMap<String, String>) - Method in class FrontEnd.StateLoad
Sets the initialising data for the controller
setLocation(Coordinate) - Method in class BackEnd.FloorTile
This method sets the location of the tile.
setNumberOfPlayers(int) - Method in class BackEnd.GameLogic
Updates the game to how many players are currently playing
setNumOfPlayers(int) - Method in class BackEnd.Gameboard
Sets the number of players in the game
setPlayerPos(int, Coordinate) - Method in class BackEnd.Gameboard
This method sets the position of the specified player to the given coordinate.
setRotation(Rotation) - Method in class BackEnd.FloorTile
This method sets the rotation of the tile.

Shifts a Coordinate by a given amount does not mutate original object
